remarks: The addition operation of a monoid as a function is an onto function. (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by AV, 23-Jan-2020.)
statement:
mndpf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mndpf.p $e |- .+^ = ( +f ` G ) $.
mndpfo $p |- ( G e. Mnd -> .+^ : ( B X. B ) -onto-> B ) $.
